jobInfo.jobName: Quality Engineer 游戏测试工程师
jobInfo.postDescription:
Are you an experienced QA with a desire to work on games that have been downloaded billions of times worldwide? We’re looking for a strong team player to join the team in China. Someone who can work independently one minute, and collaborate with people across our different global studios the next. If you have excellent attention to detail, a problem-solving attitude, and great knowledge of the Chinese mobile gaming market, then we want to hear from you! 
你是一名有经验的QA人员吗？渴望加入全球下载了数十亿次游戏的QA工作吗？ 我们中国团队正在寻找一名优秀的团队成员。一个可以在上一分钟内独立自主工作，并在下一分钟与我们全球各工作室合作的人。如果你关注细节，有解决问题的态度，深入了解中国的移动游戏市场，那么我们期待你的加入！
In this role you will
Test new and existing game features.
Validate in-game localizations for the Chinese market.
Monitor app performance and stability.
Verify analytics data. //
职责
测试新的和现有的游戏功能。
验证中国市场的游戏本地化。
监控应用性能和稳定性。
验证分析数据。
What we’re looking for
Good eye for aesthetics and excellent attention to detail.
Good knowledge of the English language, both written and spoken.
Independent working style.
Strong troubleshooting skills. //
要求技能
良好的审美眼光，对细节高度关注。
良好的书面英语和口语。
独立自主的工作方式。
较强的故障排除技能。

Your experience
2+ years of experience in mobile games testing.
Good knowledge of the Android mobile platform (knowledge of IOS is a plus).
Hands-on experience in preparing test scenarios.
Experience with common test tools like Charles, Monkey, or Airtest is a plus. //
所需经验
3年以上软件测试经验（手机应用测试优先）。
了解安卓移动平台（同时熟悉IOS者优先）。
有针对场景准备测试用例的实践经验。
有使用Charles，Monkey和Airtest等常用测试工具的经验。

What we offer
Employment relationship for one year, with a three-month probationary period and the option to prolong the contract for an indefinite period of time.
Diverse work with exciting daily challenges, working as part of a young team in a fun, relaxed environment.
The opportunity for personal and professional development.
Participation in attractive projects. //

我们提供什么
多元化的工作，每天都有令人兴奋的挑战，作为年轻团队的一员，在有趣、轻松的环境中工作。
个人和职业发展的机会。
参与有吸引力的项目。
COMPENSATION
Compensation will be constructed of a salary and participation in the group reward plan. // 薪酬 将制定一套薪酬方案，包括基本工资和参与企业利润分享。
jobInfo.address: 上海徐汇区氪空间·徐家汇社区2层

brandComInfo.introduce:
奥飞特七（outfit7）是中国游戏行业广告收入前三强之一。目前公开招贤纳士，为您提供富有竞争力的职业发展机遇。如果您具有丰富的行业经验和专业知识，渴望加入全球下载量（我的汤姆猫游戏系列）达140亿、月活跃用户人数（MAU）高达4.1亿的企业，快来联系我们吧！我们将携手塑造品牌未来，创意启动覆盖百万流量。

An incredible opportunity just opened up at Outfit7, one of the Top 3 companies in China for in-game ad revenue. If you have experiences, expertise, and a desire to work for a company with 14 billion global downloads (My Talking 'Tom apps) and up to 410 million MAU, then get in touch! Help us shape the future of the brand and create campaigns that reach millions.
